project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a contact book application in Python that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the user will interact with the application through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the functionality to add a contact
Implement the functionality to search for a contact
Implement the functionality to update a contact
Implement the functionality to delete a contact
Implement functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Implement functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement the user interface for interaction through the terminal
Write tests for each of the functionalities implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
